short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a touch of whimsy and adventure to your new tab with the Planet Kirby live wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring the lovable Kirby in a vibrant, dreamy planet setting, this design brings joy and fun to your browsing experience. Quickly access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, and personalize your tab by adding custom links. Stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock, and search the web effortlessly with your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy the playful Kirby on his dreamy planet in your new tab.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Instantly access your most visited websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with your favorite links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of time and dates with the built-in calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web easily using your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
